Control Name: 4.14. Ensure server parameter 'log_connections' is set to 'ON' for PostgreSQL Database Server
Control Statement: Enabling log_connections helps PostgreSQL Database to log attempted connection to the server, as well as successful completion of client authentication. Log data can be used to identify, troubleshoot, and repair configuration errors and suboptimal performance.
